divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to take the trash out and looked towards the west and noticed a Red glowing ball of light that looked like a booster falling from the sky about 30,000 feet up then it just disapeared as if someone turned out the light. It was brighter then a star. It was so bright you could spot it easily and was worth reporting on this website because someone told me if you see a ufo report it especially the time because ufos travel.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around July 17th 2010
